name: react-ssr-kit
description: Starter kit for server side rendering with React and Redux

scripts.build: yarn run build:client && yarn run build:server
scripts.build:client: rm -rf Client && babel src -d Client --copy-files --ignore Server.js,views/* && mv Client/Client.js Client/index.js
scripts.build:server: rm -rf SSRMiddleware && babel src -d SSRMiddleware --copy-files --ignore Client.js && mv SSRMiddleware/SSRMiddleware.js SSRMiddleware/index.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf SSRMiddleware && rm -rf Client && rm -rf example/node_modules && rm -rf example/build

author: Emanuele Longo
